roleset.name: occur at the same time
roleset.note: COINCIDE-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus and autoexpansion via verbnet. Member of VNcls amalgamate-22.2-2-1, correlate-86.1. (from coincide.01-v)

role.descr: second thing, at the same time as what

example.name: separated events
example.text: The leaders' talks coincided with a meeting in Madrid of anti-drug experts from the U.S., France, Italy, Spain, Peru, Bolivia and Colombia.
example.arg: with a meeting in Madrid of anti-drug experts from the U.S., France, Italy, Spain, Peru, Bolivia and Colombia
